document_data.name: Ajloon
document_data.mainbody: '''Ajloon''' was a shade who served the [[Night Guard]] of the [[Prince of Shade]] [[Yder Tanthul]], for a brief period as his second-in-command, during the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Personality: Ajloon could not be easily intimidated, even by those the more powerful of shades of [[Thultanthar]]. While he lacked some insight, he would readily learn from his experiences and those who offered him advice.
document_data.Relationships: While Yder could often be short with Ajloon,
document_data.History: Ajloon was among the shades that followed Yder in pursuit of the ''[[Eye of Gruumsh (relic)|Eye of Gruumsh]]'' during the month of [[Uktar]] in the {{YearlinkName|1486}}.
